name: obsidian-group-snippets
description: Create folder of snippets to activate them in one click !

scripts.vault: node esbuild.config.mjs production && copy main.js "I:\Seed\.obsidian\plugins\obsidian-group-snippets" && copy styles.css "I:\Seed\.obsidian\plugins\obsidian-group-snippets"
scripts.beta: commit-and-tag-version  --prerelease --tag-build beta && node version-beta.mjs && git add manifest-beta.json && git commit --amend --no-edit
scripts.publish: commit-and-tag-version && node version-beta.mjs && git add manifest-beta.json && git commit --amend --no-edit
